Html:
I'm a big fan of your gmap for WinForms. Now I have to learn how to write for WinRT. My question is:
WinRT and WPF are almost similar. Is it possible to rewrite your WPF DLL for WinRT?

I believe that Metro, or better said, WinRT will be successfully at the end and GMaps would be a great Tool for tabletts and also for Win Phones.
maybe, but i don't have any tablet ;/
